meanings.sent1: I use my mobe to call my friend.
meanings.sent2: She forgot her mobe at home today.
meanings.sent3: The mobe rang loudly during the movie.
meanings.sent4: His shiny mobe was the envy of his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The lost mobe was found under the couch.

meanings.definition: To move or shift from one place to another
meanings.sent1: Can you mobe the chair to the other side of the room?
meanings.sent2: The workers will mobe the heavy boxes carefully.
meanings.sent3: He tried to mobe the mountain, but it didn't budge.
meanings.sent4: The clouds mobe slowly across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's feet mobe gracefully to the music.
